nav.div: Knox Community School Corporation » About KCSC » What's New » Coronavirus Announcement

div.img:
From the Starke County Superintendents:
​
Beginning Monday, March 16th all Starke County Public Schools will be closed due to the threat of the COVID-19 virus. This decision was made with input from county health officials.
​
Individual corporations will determine how e-learning days and Governor Holcum’s approved 20 waived days will be used.
​ All extra-curricular activities including practices, games, performances, and contests are canceled through April 10th.
Administrators and teachers in each corporation will be meeting on Monday, March 16th to make detailed plans.
Again, Monday, March 16th all corporations are closed. There will be no e-learning on March 16th.
Teachers will report to their corporation on March 16th as a work day.
​ More information will be forthcoming.

div.div: #2 Redskin Trail, Knox, IN 46534 | Phone (574) 772-1600 | Fax (574) 772-1608
